title: ICE: 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: sentinel == STR_SENTINEL' (nightly e6b883c74 2021-12-08, crate zip 0.5.13)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust ``` ### Meta ``` rustc 1.59.0-nightly (e6b883c74 2021-12-08) cargo 1.58.0-nightly (40dc28175 2021-12-06) ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling zip v0.5.13 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: sentinel == STR_SENTINEL', /rustc/e6b883c74f49f32cb5d1cbad3457f2b8805a4a38/compiler/rustc_serialize/src/opaque.rs:669:9 ```

x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `zip` ```
